meta.name: Dragons' Den
meta.description: Dragons' Den, an original CBC Production and audience favourite, returns to delight viewers for a new season.Aspiring entrepreneurs from across Canada vie for a coveted spot in the Den to pitch potentially profitable business investments to some of the nation's most successful tycoons. The Dragons use their own money and know-how and have the power to catapult companies into home-grown business success stories.Every episode theatre and venture capital collide. Stakes are high as good deals may be rewarded, but there's also the risk that bad ideas will get burned. Dragons' Den offers the audience a front-row view as the country's top business moguls wheel and deal with entrepreneurs who dare to brave the Den.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: An exercise machine has the Dragons lacking motivation; a tidal energy bridge gets a dose of reality; and two entrepreneurs enter the Den to pitch their magnetic gift card idea.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The Dragons are presented with a business idea for self-help "Mystical Cards" and a pair of super binoculars claim to be able to see through almost anything.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Two recent MBA graduates believe they have the next big business idea; a "Ski Limo" pitch promises to chauffeur non-skiers down the slopes.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: The show begins on a high note with an idea for amusement park rides; an entrepreneur tries to sell the Dragons on a special brand of bottled water.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A hopeful entrepreneur enters the Den with cheeky underwear and things heat up in the Den when an entrepreneur pitches a new spin on cook stoves.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A pitch for a hi-tech billboard and an entrepreneur tries to convince the Dragons there's big business in custom-made pet products.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: In this special encore presentation of the premiere episode of Dragons' Den, an exercise machine has the Dragons lacking motivation.

videos.title: Episode 8 (Update Special)
videos.overview: The Dragons catch up with some of the most unforgettable entrepreneurs from the season.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The season premiere of Dragons' Den features a new Dragon, Calgary entrepreneur Arlene Dickinson.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The season premiere of Dragons' Den features a new Dragon, Calgary entrepreneur Arlene Dickinson.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A prolific inventor with bags and bags of products gets a fiery message from the Dragons; a brother-sister team hopes to get a "sweet" deal with their Calgary teashop.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: The Dragons have an electrifying showdown with an aggressive entrepreneur, an innovative new water bottle that leaves the Dragons thirsty for more.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A sexy spice peddler makes a desperate plea to the Dragons and a self-proclaimed math whiz challenges the Dragons not to give him money.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: An arrogant young entrepreneur makes a bet that Arlene is wrong; a fishing game that starts a bidding war among the Dragons; and a new take on the old pizza box.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: A high-energy entrepreneur skates circles around the Dragons; an underground fortune that requires major digging; and a business that goes to the dogs.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: The Prime Minister's personal chef helps two brothers trying for a sweet deal and the Dragons take down a young mother's idea to connect with family and friends.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: An organized young woman charms the Dragons with her drive and determination and an 82-year-old inventor sings for his supper and his snow shovel.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A Christmas tree stand with one-hand setup; an on-demand email security system; and edible treats to fool horses into taking their medicine.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The season premiere of Dragons' Den features a new dragon, wealthy philanthropist and maverick investment banker, W. Brett Wilson.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The Dragons are torn between a superior pitcher and his inferior idea, and an acrobatic pitch by an aerial artist has Kevin showing his devilish side.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A husband and wife duo has the Dragons breathing fire with their spicy BBQ sauce; two mom-preneurs hope to make life easier with their time-saving inventions.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: An army of working women storm the Den for a powerful pitch, The Dragons junk an idea for cleaning shopping carts.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: An eager entrepreneur tries to woo the dragons into the wine business; a pair of BFFs share their big plans for the plus-size industry.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A former pro wrestler pitches an innovative barbell system; a florist wants to grow his blossoming flower business.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: An inventor with a history of bad luck changes his fortunes; a sleep-aid sets off the Dragons' alarms; and giving the boot to a sexy business proposal.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: One Dragon dishes out the dough for a good night's sleep; a pair of competitive ballroom dancers can't find their rhythm in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: An encore pitch from last season's epic inventor, a chilly invention turns up the heat, and an eco-invention melts The Dragons' frosty exterior.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: The Den goes green with a frenzy of eco-preneurs: golf tees with a twist, cutlery that slices through Kevin's critique, and more.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: The Dragons get generous during the holidays with almost 3 million dollars in deals in just one episode!

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: The Dragons and some of our most memorable entrepreneurs weigh in on what went right and what went wrong in the den.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: All 5 Dragons are back - and they're fired up for Dragons' Den's hottest season yet.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Twins with their line of lip gloss deliberate an offer; a husband and wife duo receive an icy response from the Dragons; and an eco-friendly clothing line parades through the Den.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A dance troupe really shakes things up; a hefty bank loan has an entrepreneur begging for cash; and a tattoo biz raises temperatures.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: From entrepreneur to employee, a casino dealer considers a dragon offer; a medical marijuana business ignites some moral mediation and stickers that will scare you safe.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Hopeful entrepreneurs look to turn dough into dollars; a bra business garners support from Arlene; and the Dragons get all shook up as Elvis impersonators invade the Den.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: The Dragons go for a ride on a new-fangled snowboard; an all-female auto repair shop ignites trouble with Jim; and a table hockey game receives a much needed reality check.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Tune in for this special edition of Dragons' Den where we get a blast from the past.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Turning crustaceans to cash, an aggressive offer makes two fishermen greedy; a DJ school has Arlene spinning a track; and the gloves are off in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: A sparkly swimsuit business catches the attention of the Dragons; a holistic healer tries to be "at one" with the cash flow; and a website that promotes recycling gets trashed.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Two young entrepreneurs look to spice up their pitch with a little skin, diamonds made from an unlikely source, and an unusual underwear company braves the Den.

videos.title: Episode 11 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: In this holiday edition of Dragons' Den a winter hat receives a warm reception; futuristic living goes up in smoke; and a familiar face braves the Den again.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: In this special edition of Dragons' Den, three Canadian icons bring their wealth of expertise to unsuspecting entrepreneurs.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A sauce business makes Den history; a spray that packs a bang for its buck and a dress that provokes Dragon disagreement.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: The Dragons aren't feeling "at one" with a mobile spa business, but they can't wait to get their hands on a new computer mouse; and helmet covers that promote safety and style.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: The Banana Guard doctors return with a way to rescue the rest of the fruit basket; a game that will reveal your true self; and an organic juice business.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: A diaper service that makes sure nothing goes to waste; a family who hopes a Dragon heavyweight will help them mass-market their new scale.

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: The Dragons are treated to dessert in hopes that they dish out a deal; and a condom that will keep both you and the environment safe.

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: All five Dragons go in on a million dollar offer; an eco-friendly business is willing to give it all up; and a hotel check-in business that doesn't have any clientele.

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: A pitch powers up to the tune of 1.5 million dollars; a recession fighting rock business; and a premium vodka business dances for dollars.

videos.title: Episode 20 - The Road to Riches
videos.overview: From humble beginnings and darker days, to the joys of personal and professional milestones, this distinctive finale reveals the Dragons like never before.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A fairy tale that brings hope to germaphobic travelers; a communication tool that combines the old and the new; and two innovative bathroom solutions.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A man who believes he has the cure for sleepless doggie nights; a new hand sanitizer business gets slimed; and a few fuzzy friends stop by the Den.

videos.title: Episode 17

videos.title: Episode 21
videos.overview: On the season finale, Dianne and the Dragons reflect on six incredible seasons in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The season premiere Dragons' Den Season 7!

videos.overview: A distillery business hopes the Dragons will take a shot at an investment; a posture perfectionist tries to set the Dragons straight; and a yard work tool causes a Dragon showdown.

videos.overview: A Guinness World Record holder attempts to escape the Den with investment, and more!

videos.title: Episode 20 - Year of the Dragons
videos.overview: The Dragons' Den season finale delves into the public and private lives of our very own Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The season premiere reveals a brand new Den. Plus, a snack company has its numbers crunched and the Dragons get a feel for a denim company.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A Dragon lashing is a tough sword to swallow and a father and daughter say their invention is right on target.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A six-figure ask leaves the Dragons feeling flushed, a demonstration comes to a smashing halt, and a silent skit causes confusion in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: An established business tries to wheel a deal; a pitcher horses around in the Den; and a tasty treat sparks a bidding war.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A search for a deal is underway; when it rains in the Den, it pours; and a family favourite pleases the Dragons' taste buds. Plus; a team effort gets props in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A Dragon gets whipped into shape; a pitcher tries to lock up a deal and the Dragons take a trip through time.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: In the Student Special the Dragons show off their best dance moves; an elementary idea targets a mess in the Den; and a high pitched pitch sneaks by the Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A second time entrepreneur needs a Dragon partner for some heavy lifting; a natural product causes a stink in the Den and an exercise pitch stretches a Dragon thin.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: An electric demonstration has the owner riding circles around the Dragons; a pitch that gives the Dragons a lot to digest; and a business that has its customers drooling.

videos.overview: On this holiday special, a fashion faux pas has the Dragons feeling festive; and an invention that hopes to wipe away any frosty comments.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: On this second chance special, Elvis is back in the building; a fitness enthusiast takes a second turn at the Dragons; a pitcher is thirsty for a second chance at a deal.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: On this episode of Dragons' Den, a pitcher who says that when it comes to sun protection, she's got it covered and a lecturer who wants the Dragons to connect with the earth.

videos.overview: On this episode of Dragons' Den, a pitcher looks to bag himself a deal, a pitch that will leave a lasting impression and a couple looking for EZ money.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: On this "Only in Canada" episode of Dragons' Den, two business partners try to sweet-talk the Dragons, and a kayak company looks to keep their business afloat.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: On this episode of Dragons' Den, a serial inventor puts the Dragons in the hot seat and an entrepreneur hopes the Dragons flip for his pitch.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: A pitcher has the Dragons on the edge of their seats, a farming family looks to land themselves a deal and business partners are confident they can arouse some interest.

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: On this episode of Dragons' Den, a couple pitch their Bollywood-inspired business idea and a retiree claims he has an "invisible" solution when it comes to sagging pants.

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: On this episode of Dragons' Den, a pitcher hopes to take the sting out of summer, and a coffee that nearly puts the Dragons to sleep.

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: A pair of entrepreneurs challenge the Dragons to man-up, students leave a lasting impression, and the Dragons consider taking a bite out of a family business.

videos.title: Episode 20
videos.overview: This episode of Dragons' Den is an Update Special like never before.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: In the season premiere, two new Dragons breathe fire into the Den. Watch and meet culinary kingpin Vikram Vij, and Michael Wekerle, the reigning rock star of Canadian finance.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A new Dragon exercises his will and tightens his wallet; an athletic pitch hopes to line-up a deal; and siblings try to yodel their way into the Dragons' hearts.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: An entrepreneur bares all with her cheeky business; the Dragons wonder if an inventor is driven by blind ambition; and a cheesy pitch leaves the Dragons hungry for more.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A mystical mock-up makes the Dragons choose between fantasy and reality, plus a modest ask leaves the Dragons humbled.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: In this Student Special, a university couple thinks they have the magic touch and the youngest entrepreneur to ever take on the Dragons hopes her lunch-break idea is appealing.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: The mood in the Den is amplified when the Dragons are thrown into the mix and a hard-working family hopes to cook up a deal.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: A chic entrepreneur makes a big splash in the Den and gets one Dragon's temperature rising.

videos.title: Episode 8 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: In this holiday special, a determined entrepreneur challenges conventions and makes Den history. And an enthusiastic snowboarder tries to keep his cool as excitement sparks.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: In this second chance special, a returning duo hopes their new line will be a perfect fit and a meaty proposition has one entrepreneur believing the third time is the charm.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A sporty entrepreneur thinks a friendly game of catch will get the Dragons playing hardball for a deal and a hero swoops into the Den aiming to leave with a fairy tale ending.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: A musical entrepreneur tries to strike a chord with the Dragons and an honest storeowner lays it all on the table.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: An entrepreneur exposes it all to have the Dragons weigh in, plus, accomplished Canadian athletes hope the Dragons will join their team.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: One entrepreneur thinks he has the right skills to be an industry ringleader and one product's outlawed origins rear an ethical motive.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: A family hopes their twist on tradition will give the Dragons a taste for success and one family's story inspires the Dragons to see their wealth at heart.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: A legendary creature is spotted in the Den and an adventurous business model has the Dragons on edge. Plus a wild opportunity looks to breed success with a Dragon partner.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: A legendary creature is spotted in the Den and an adventurous business model has the Dragons on edge. Plus a wild opportunity looks to breed success with a Dragon partner.

videos.overview: Three friends hope they will be able to toast to a Dragon deal and a pair of nurses think the Dragons will want in, after they have a chance to sleep on it.

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: A brave entrepreneur hopes his product won't put him on a razor's edge and a long-time entrepreneur hopes his bitter story helps him make a sweet deal.

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: A company hopes to scare the Dragons into joining an apocalyptic deal and an entrepreneur thinks a cap in hand presentation will win the Dragons over.

videos.title: Episode 20
videos.overview: On this special episode of Dragons' Den, we celebrate success in every form. And for the first time ever, the Dragons reveal their secrets to success.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: On the season ten premiere, three new Dragons breathe fire into the Den.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: With the help of some furry friends, one company has the Dragons clawing for a deal.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Two friends think the best way to the Dragons' wallets is through their stomachs and a farmer serves up a taste of her bubbly business.

videos.title: Episode 5

videos.overview: Dragons' Den Season 10's Student Special features some of Canada's youngest and talented entrepreneurs.

videos.overview: A music artist enters the Den with his kid-friendly music, a hard-working entrepreneur brings the Dragons to tears, and outdoor enthusiasts are on the hunt for a partner.

videos.overview: An unconventional twist on a Canadian classic, childhood friends look for a million-dollar investment into their online business, a father-son team aim to land a partner, and more!

videos.title: Episode 9 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: People spend a lot of money this time of year, will the Dragons join in or will the spirit of Scrooge visit the Den?

videos.title: Episode 10 (Second Chances)
videos.overview: This season's Second Chance special! Brave entrepreneurs return to face the Dragons again, with the hope of a better result.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: The Dragons battle it out in the Den... who will win? Plus, an entrepreneur dubbed "The Ass Man" hopes the Dragons can get behind his soothing solution and more.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: A puzzling pitch leaves the Dragons feeling panicked, a returning company thinks its Major League partnership will help score a home run, and more!

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: An entrepreneur hopes the Dragons roll the dice on his Casino company, a techpreneur gets a virtual-reality check, and more!

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: An under-the-sea inspired entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will float her some cash, a former NHL enforcer hopes to score big, and more.

videos.title: Episode 15 (Family Special)
videos.overview: Sometimes business and family can mix! Watch the Season 10 Family Special now.

videos.title: Episode 16 (Update Special)

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: Tensions rise between Dragons after a company turns up the volume in the Den... and much more!

videos.overview: A business sails into the Den looking for a share of the Dragons' loot, a former waitress thinks she can charm her way into a sweet deal, and much more!

videos.title: Episode 21
videos.overview: A colourful pitch hopes a Dragon will join their party plans, a fitness pitch has the Den breaking a sweat, and more!

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: On the Season 11 premiere, a product works to put out the stink it's caused in the Den, a financial education platform with a big ask hopes for big interest, and more!

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: An entrepreneur breaks down more than just numbers in the Den, a family hopes their rich history has the Dragons seeing dollars, and more!

videos.title: Episode 3 (Shop the Den Special)
videos.overview: In Season 11's Shop the Den Special, hockey dads think their product can go head-to-head against stiff competition, a green product has some Dragons seeing red, and more!

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A supplement company gets a dose of Dragon fire, a trio says they their app could spin the Dragons' investment into a significant net profit, and more!

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A fitness company puts the Dragons to the test, one of Joe Mimran's former fashion models looks to inspire an organic partnership, and more!

videos.title: Episode 6 (Why Didn't I Think of That?)
videos.overview: Season 11 highlights Canadian inventors in a brand new special episode, where simple ideas leave the Dragons wondering "Why didn't I think of that?"

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: A pitch causes the Dragons' tempers to short-circuit, Manjit Minhas makes her biggest offer in the Den, and more!

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Tensions rise between Dragons when a company turns up the volume in the Den, a big ask leaves the Dragons questioning the company's projections, and more!

videos.title: Episode 9 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: In Season 11's Holiday Special, a married couple returns to the Den with bright hopes of getting everything on their wish list, the Dragons get rocks and socks as gifts and more!

videos.title: Episode 10 (Second Chance Special)
videos.overview: In this Second Chance Special, a fantasy face-off in the Den has both Dragons and pitchers up in arms, a family favourite hopes to reap the rewards of their hard work, and more!

videos.title: Episode 11 (DNA of a Dragon)
videos.overview: We take a journey with the Dragons to discover the origins of their entrepreneurial success.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: A company hopes some furry friends will help them catch a deal, a salesman tries his best to wheel and deal in the Den, and more!

videos.title: Episode 13 (Student Special)
videos.overview: In Season 11's Student Special, a duo teach the Dragons that age isn't an obstacle, an East Coast entrepreneur says her business is a class above the competition, and more!

videos.title: Episode 14 (Canadian Dream)
videos.overview: First generation Canadians share their journeys and help build a better economy, as we celebrate what it means to live "the Canadian Dream."

videos.title: Episode 15 (Family Special)
videos.overview: In Season 11's Family Special, a father and son hope the Dragons will get into the right head space to help turn their virtual dream into a reality, and more!

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: A hockey fanatic hopes to score a hat trick of deals, an entrepreneur believes her mobile app will remedy a significant gap in the health industry, and more!

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: An active pitch hopes to break down barriers in the Den, a DNA-based business performs a paternity test, and more!

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: Brothers with a short term product hope for a long term partner, a beauty product reveals its secret ingredient, and more!

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: A sports-themed company wants to prove they're ready to lay it all on the table, an online business prepares to buck up against its own industry, and more!

videos.title: Episode 20 (Battle)
videos.overview: Businesses go head-to-head with each other. The Dragons decide who continues their pitch, and who will be shown the dreaded door.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: This two-hour special features ten Canadian businesses hoping to score a deal with the Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A company thinks it will be barking up the right tree with the help of a few celebrity endorsements, a trampoline studio seeks a strategic partner, and more!

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A company thinks it will be barking up the right tree with the help of a few celebrity endorsements, a trampoline studio seeks a strategic partner, and more!

videos.title: Episode 4 (Student Special)
videos.overview: A tween author publishes an inspiring future, Waterloo students pitch their innovative health product which makes the Dragons skip a beat, and more!

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A couple of business partners pop the question to the Dragons, a brilliant inventor impresses the Den with his big idea, and more!

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A guitarist plans to sync with the right Dragon to rock on a deal, a company thinks the Dragons will fall in love with their product after they sleep on it, and more!

videos.title: Episode 7 (Heroes Special)
videos.overview: The Den honours Canadian heroes in the Heroes Special.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: An entrepreneur hopes to extinguish Dragon doubt over his product, a sneakerhead wants to prove that his company is the perfect fit for a Dragon investment and more!

videos.title: Episode 9 (Why Didn't I Think of That?)
videos.overview: Why Didn't I Think of That? The Dragons get an eye-opening glimpse at innovations in Canada and what it takes to turn a good idea into a great business.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: An art dealer reveals his custom royalty portraits to the Dragons, an ice cream lover shows the Dragons how to roll, and more!

videos.title: Episode 11 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: Holiday-themed businesses face the Dragons with great gifts, stocking stuffers and some shocking proposals  all with hopes of getting the Dragons to channel their inner Santa.

videos.title: Episode 12 (Second Chance)
videos.overview: In this second chance special, a circus troupe leaves the Dragons in awe, a successful father and daughter duo think their new product will stick, and more!

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: Sparks fly in the Den over whether one business is as bright as some Dragons may think, a flashy demonstration aims to get the Dragons off their feet, and more!

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Sparks fly in the Den over whether one business is as bright as some Dragons may think, a flashy demonstration aims to get the Dragons off their feet, and more!

videos.title: Episode 15 (Family Special)
videos.overview: A father-son team looks to drive their concept home by playing it safe, a family business hopes the Dragons won't send them packing, and more!

videos.title: Episode 16 (Inside the Den)
videos.overview: Paul Sun-Hyung Lee, guest-hosts a new special episode that welcomes back some of the most unforgettable pitchers from the last 12 seasons.

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: An auto enthusiast hopes to drive away with a deal, a fitness enthusiast says her energetic demo will help the Dragons get a grip and more!

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: An entrepreneur rides into the Den thirsty for an investment, a group of students hope the Dragons turn their virtual dream into a reality, and more!

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: Taekwondo athletes enter the Den fighting, a financially-fit duo hope to prove they can make every cent count, and more!

videos.title: Episode 20
videos.overview: A thirst-quenching proposal has the Dragons energized for a deal, a volcano owner goes up against Dragon fire, and much more!

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: In the season premiere, two new Dragons bring their expertise to the panel.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A gym owner seeks a strategic partner to row his business to the top, a duo seeks investment for a pet product they hope the Dragons will eat up, and much more!

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: An inventive mother looks to show the Dragons she doesn't make rash decisions, a company hopes the Dragons can stomach their business proposal, and more!

videos.title: Episode 4 (Behind the Scenes Special)
videos.overview: For the first time ever, Dragons' Den pulls back the curtain to reveal the exciting inner workings of Canada's favourite business show.

videos.title: Episode 5 (Up in Smoke Special)
videos.overview: Are the Dragons are ready to cash in on Canada's newest cash crop?

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A duo hopes their pitch isn't off key, a caffeine product needs a Dragon boost, and much more!

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: An entrepreneur reveals the "tooth" about dental hygiene, a theatrical team aims to be the highlight of the show and more!

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A table-top discussion sparks Dragon competition, pet enthusiasts hope to bark up the right money tree and more!

videos.title: Episode 9 (Side Hustle Special)
videos.overview: From the tech world to the oil rigs, the side hustle entrepreneurs leave behind their day jobs to show the Dragons they have the skills to make their passion a full time pursuit.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A team of entrepreneurs hopes the Dragons will gush over their business, a group of friends look to transform the furniture industry and more!

videos.title: Episode 11 (Holiday Special)
videos.overview: Our entrepreneurs aim to win over the Dragons' inner Scrooge with their winter-themed gear, meals, and stocking stuffers.

videos.title: Episode 12 (Student Special)
videos.overview: In this Student Special, the Dragons are about to get schooled as students give them a lesson in their business ideas.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A trio hopes to get some Dragon bucks for their take on a tux, an entrepreneur looks to continue his cycle of success, and more!

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: A team of estheticians create a hairy situation in the Den, a hockey coach reveals a game-changing invention, and more!

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: A couple is taking baby steps towards growing their prototype into a big business, an electrician thinks that a Dragon partner would fit his business like a glove, and more!

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: A team of triathletes hopes their pitch doesn't leave them hearing crickets, an inventor aims to plant the seed for an investment, and more!

videos.title: Episode 17 (Valentine's Day Special)
videos.overview: The Dragons are fired up and looking for passionate pitchers and proposals, hoping to make the perfect partnership in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 18 (Family Special)
videos.overview: With support from their loved ones behind the scenes, will these companies expand their family tree to include a Dragon?

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: A furniture company wants to avoid getting drilled by the Dragons, a yoga instructor hopes to bring some zen into the Den with some furry friends, and more!

videos.title: Episode 20 (Next Level Special)
videos.overview: Proven entrepreneurs need Dragon dollars to take them to the next level.

videos.overview: An adrenaline seeker hopes to kick off the season in an extreme way, plus a pair of friends look to show the Dragons their green thumb...and more!

videos.overview: An athlete calls in recruits to help puncture the Dragons' wallets, a trio look to redecorate the Den, and more!

videos.overview: A company hopes to be worth its weight in Dragon gold, an entrepreneur who's not worried about breaking a sweat, and more!

videos.overview: Family businesses descend on the Den in this special episode. Siblings, parents, and children look to open their companies and families to the Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 9 (Disrupt Den)
videos.overview: In this special episode, entrepreneurs shake up the Den by showing the Dragons their revolutionary ideas that are changing the game.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Firefighters hope to spray the competition away; two brothers seek investment for their homegrown solution; an entrepreneur hopes to be judged on his footwork.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: An inventor hopes to find her Dragon sole-mate; and two business partners give a refreshingly clean pitch. Plus, an entrepreneur pitches a business with some valuable material.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: In this episode, a confectionary couple give the Dragons a taste of history. Later, a cheerful young entrepreneur hopes her new app will get the Dragons jumping for joy.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: In this episode, an entrepreneur serves the catch of the day to the Dragons, while another company is very invested in pitching to the Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A student hopes his invention will be aprs-ciated in the Den and one duo sends the Dragons a message they'll never forget.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: wo friends strip away the stigma of a certain mens' swimwear fashion; two entrepreneurs approach their pitch gingerly; one duo puts a new spin on an old skill.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Two friends look for an investment in their sustainable product; an entrepreneur marches to the beat of his own drum; a new product in the gaming world; one entrepreneur hopes that a rotten smell will yield some sweet investments.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: In this episode, business partners look to smooth the bumps out of their pitch. Also an East Coast duo looks to mount a successful pitch.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: This week, a duo hits the sweet spot in the Den! Later, an entrepreneur calls on a familiar friend to help them out.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: In the season finale, sisters shower the Dragons with a fresh pitch. Also, an entrepreneur lets the good times roll with some catchy tunes.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: In the season premiere, a new Dragon brings his expertise to the panel while a passionate entrepreneur hopes to pedal out some cash.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: This week in the Den, a fitness duo looks to climb the ladder of success. Also, a fashion forward entrepreneur seeks investment to keep his brand in vogue.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: This week in the Den, a racer sets the pace for virtual events. Plus, a couple hopes the Dragons will help them ride a wave to success.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: An entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will flip for his flour. Also, an environmentalist looks to entertain with his recycling revenue; and a cat-lover hopes for a pawsitive reception.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: An entrepreneur hopes her business is a deal du jour; and an entrepreneur seeks a Dragon partner to help him hit the road. Plus, a couple looks to call it a wash in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: This week in the Den, an entrepreneur hopes his business is worth a tonne and a sibling duo look to harvest liquid assets from crabby Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: This week in the Den, a chiropractor looks to pump the Dragons for a deal. Plus, a couple looks to prove that where there's a will there's a way.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: This week in the Den, a chiropractor looks to pump the Dragons for a deal. Plus, a couple looks to prove that where there's a will there's a way.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: This week in the Den, childhood friends look to impress the Dragons with their baggage. Plus, brothers hope to win the Dragons over piece by piece.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: This week in the Den, an entrepreneur wants to add a Dragon to his team. Plus, a husband and wife duo look for a Dragon partner to take their business from the ground up.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: A former dragon returns with more fire than ever; an entrepreneur aims to catch a deal for his seafood innovation; a brother-sister duo hopes for an eye-deal investment; a mompreneur sprinkles her charm.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A team of plant lovers grows on the dragons; an ultralight backpacker proves that there's no timeline on entrepreneurship; cousins touch on the importance of family; a bubbly entrepreneur leaves the dragons thirsty to make a deal.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Two maritimers try to sell the Dragons on their sparkling supply; a set of entrepreneurs promise to pump up more than the Dragons' wallets; a teacher turned business owner is a fish out of water; a group of friends show the Dragons their briefs.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A duo hopes to cut through the red tape and secure a deal with the Dragons; two entrepreneurs may need more than an asking price if they want a Dragon to buy in.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A mother sets up shop and parks herself in the Den; an entrepreneur has something in store for the Dragons; a student hopes the Dragons don't chill his assets; a familiar face hopes for a saucy comeback.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A married couple plays the numbers game, counting on a deal with the Dragons; an entrepreneur wants the Dragons to get wrapped up in her business; an engineer and doctor duo hope to receive a ringing endorsement.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: An entrepreneur wants to clean up the streets; restaurateurs hope to get a Dragon's investment; a student hopes for a deal; business partners hope the Dragons don't brush them off.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Big city distillers hope happy hour comes with a deal; an east coast team hopes their latest innovation will be music to the Dragons ears; and a company rises to the occasion when things get heated. Plus, business partners think springing a deal will get them a good night's rest.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch to the Dragons seeking investments; a couple turns to the fashion industry; a company provides a new animal treat; a plant lover hopes to get a deal.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A mother-daughter team plows its way into the Den; a married couple makes a splash and looks to clean up; a designer hopes her custom demonstration will sew up a Dragon deal.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Two Vancouver entrepreneurs hope to roll away with an investment; a duo from Montreal aims to take their imaging technology to new heights; a former hockey player hopes to score a deal in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Two Vancouver fitness experts work up a sweat in the Den; a West Coast entrepreneur aims to nail down an investment; a Calgary entrepreneur unzips his new invention; two Toronto business partners capitalize on a cool new trend.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Two Montreal entrepreneurs hope to be top dog in the Den; a father-daughter duo gears up to impress the Dragons with a shocking demonstration; two business partners try to master the art of the deal.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A New Brunswick entrepreneur and her business partner try to smooth things over with their hair product; things get rocky for a West Coast couple and their paddle boards; a Montrealer's invention is music to the Dragons' ears.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Two Quebec City entrepreneurs impress the dragons with a memorable entrance; a Montreal business owner brings a franchisee to share the floor; four Toronto business partners hope the dragons go with the flow of their pitch.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Three business partners from Ontario share their beverage line; a Vancouver duo cozies up in the Den; a West Coast entrepreneur struggles to hook the dragons on her plant-based seafood; the dragons are shocked by a wearable invention.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: A Calgary entrepreneur rides a wave of emotions in his pitch; a Toronto business owner has the Dragons wishing she had a larger bump in sales; and tension rises when an entrepreneur hopes to take his delivery service to new heights. Plus, one family has a musical entrance into the Den.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A West Coast entrepreneur uncovers her underwear business; two Ontario entrepreneurs must learn to face the music; and business owners pitch a sweet solution to the Dragons. Also, the Dragons have a cow when an unexpected visitor enters the Den.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: A Toronto chef challenges the Dragons to a cooking competition; a Montreal entrepreneur says mined diamonds aren't a girl's best friend; and an Ontario entrepreneur tries to tie up a big deal with the Dragons. Also a Saskatchewan business owner tries to not freeze up against the Dragons.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A West Coast entrepreneur wows the Dragons with his business and his energy; a Toronto business-owner accessorizes the Dragons; an Alberta entrepreneur presents her solution for parents turned chauffeurs.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: An off-grid couple presents their fermented brew; an Alberta team leads the Dragons in a cake-off; a West Coast entrepreneur gives the Dragons a boost with her supplements; a BC team finds themselves on the edge of a deal for their ski apparel.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: A West Coast duo arrives with precious cargo; an Ontario business owner freshens up the Den; an entrepreneur revamps the Dragons' credit cards; a West Coast entrepreneur puts a new spin on an old product.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: An entrepreneur brings a tech solution for Michele's closet; a West Coast family hopes its dreams of a deal don't become sour grapes; an Ontario duo puts its best foot forward; a couple from Ottawa tries to satisfy the Dragons' sweet tooth.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: An entrepreneur couple puts on a show for the Dragons; a Toronto team brings some mojo to the den; a West Coast entrepreneur helps the Dragons get organized.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: A West Coast couple offers to protect to the Dragons; a duo from New Brunswick offers a tasty healthcare solution; a Saskatchewan entrepreneur gets Wes to help fry up a deal; an entrepreneur shows the Dragons how they can rent the runway.

videos.title: The After Effect
videos.overview: Catching up with 13 companies who braved the Dragons to find out what happens after the Den; the Dragons discuss the key takeaways from the show and what it's legacy means to them.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Two Vancouver entrepreneurs hope the Dragons pounce on their brand; brothers from Alberta look to charm the Den with their spirit; an Ontarian mother shatters the glass ceiling; an Ajax resident tries not to scratch his chance at a deal.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: A couple dares the Dragons to show their most intimate item of clothing; a duo steps into the Den striving for a golden deal; a young entrepreneur faces the fire to educate Dragons about curly hair.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A female entrepreneur swings her idea to the Dragons; two Manitoba entrepreneurs look for a safety net in the Dragons; Quebec business owners pop their idea into the Den; an Ontarian couple pitch their weightless idea.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: An entrepreneur crashes his tour guide business into the Den; a couple sits the Dragons down to discuss a modular deal; a one-woman show tries to negotiate a recyclable deal; a pet lover hopes the Dragons don't feel imprisoned by his deal.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: An entrepreneur is enthusiastic his idea will blow the Dragons into making a deal; a female business owner hopes her secret sauce doesn't scare the Dragons; a family of creators looks to help out their community.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A young female entrepreneur hits the road with her carefully crafted idea; a sports enthusiast pitches his idea in the Den; and a mompreneur works her deal into the Dragons' wombs; a mother and son duo pitch their slippery business.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: A former Olympian brings her large business to the Den; brothers-in-law look for anything but a claustrophobic deal; and a group of friends hope to satisfy the Dragons' sweet tooth; a young female entrepreneur slices her way through a deal.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: West Coast besties looking to sweep the Den with their cleaning products; an Ontario couple sets out to prove that not all angels have wings; and a Vancouver couple hopes to show that small products have mighty returns. Plus, a Toronto couple looks to bake up a deal in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Friends from Ontario want to raise a glass to a deal; and a Toronto entrepreneur hopes the Dragons don't think he's showboating; a fashionista from Winnipeg sets her sights on a bright deal.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Drew Scott fuels the fire as a special guest Dragon across multiple episodes; a sibling team hopes to negotiate a sweet deal; a duo aims to snuggle up with the Dragons; an entrepreneur storms the Den with a bold splash of colour.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Friends from Vancouver hope the Dragons are thirsty; an entrepreneur is turning jewelry into wearable words; a Toronto entrepreneur is looking to redecorate. A duo from Courtice is hoping the Dragons will warm to their secret formula for success.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Twin brothers look to carve out a deal on the slopes; an east coast entrepreneur toasts to the Dragons; and an inventor hopes to flush out a win. Plus, a Montreal founder looks to build a green empire.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A Montreal entrepreneur brings a whole new layer to home protection; childhoodfriends hope to take their small-town game to the big leagues; a founder with a bloomingbusiness hopes the Dragons will stop to smell the flowers.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: An entrepreneur looks for Dragon support that doesn't come down to the wire; brothers hope to grow their family rice business with their out of the box innovation; a crew from Victoria look for a Dragon to grab an oar and join the team.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: In this episode, two brothers hope to lock in a concrete deal; two friends hope the Dragons willlike their gutsy snack; a fitness company gears up for success. Plus, a team from Gatineau lookto cozy up to the Dragons and wrap up a deal.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: New Brunswick builders hope to prove they can turn trash into indestructible treasure, a Vancouver entrepreneur hopes to get the Dragons' wheels spinning with his grind, and a founder with a social-mission looks to feed the flames in the Den.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Two friends serve up tasteful tours; a family aims for a hole-in-one; two friends hope to filter out the competition.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: In this episode, entrepreneurs from London hope the Dragons will be hyper for their icy treat; a founder from Hamilton hopes the Dragons will perk up at the sound of her enhancement product; and two friends hope the Dragons will help them scale up while they help seniors scale down. Plus, an entrepreneur from Toronto hopes to turn the temperature up in the Den with her Vietnamese hot sauce.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Two cousins hope the Dragons will branch out into the Christmas tree market; a couple hopes the Dragons will toast to their cream liqueur; and a founder hopes to expand her one woman village; two brothers look to clean up the competition.
